Room.Name: Avatar Boulevard/Neilian Drive Intersection
Room.ShortDescription: You are at the intersection of Neilian Drive and Avatar Boulevard.
Room.LongDescription: Neilian Drive heads off to the east from the intersection with Avatar Boulevard, which continues to run to the north and south. To the north, you can see the Anthian Bridge, which crosses over the river Othax, which flows into the Lyanden Lake.
